data.name: initMarble
data.description: create a new marble, store into chaincode state

data.name: readMarble
data.description: read a marble from chaincode state

data.name: readMarblePrivateDetails
data.description: read a marble private details from chaincode state

input.value: string.concat("Marble private details does not exist: ", $flow.parameters.name)

data.name: delete
data.description: remove a marble key/value pair from state

data.name: transferMarble
data.description: transfer a marble by setting a new owner name on the marble

data.name: getMarblesByRange
data.description: performs a range query based on the start and end keys provided

data.name: queryMarblesByOwner
data.description: queries for marbles based on a passed-in owner

triggers.name: Transaction
triggers.description: create a new marble, store into chaincode state

handlers.description: create a new marble, store into chaincode state
read a marble from chaincode state
read a marble private details from chaincode state
remove a marble key/value pair from state
transfer a marble by setting a new owner name on the marble
performs a range query based on the start and end keys provided
queries for marbles based on a passed-in owner
